Pre-Game Insights: The Raptors are 1-3 in Eastern Conference games.
The Raptors are 1-3 in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
The Pistons are 4-7 against conference opponents.
Detroit is second in the Eastern Conference with 35.3 defensive rebounds per game led by Tobias Harris averaging 6.6.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Raptors average 112.8 points per game, 1.0 more point than the 111.8 the Pistons allow.
The Pistons are shooting 46.5% from the field, 1.3% lower than the 47.8% the Raptors' opponents have shot this season.
Jakob Poeltl is averaging 13.9 points and 11.1 rebounds for the Raptors.
Cade Cunningham is scoring 23.8 points per game and averaging 7.2 rebounds for the Pistons.
The Raptors are on a 5-game slide.
Others: Kelly Olynyk: out (back), Bruce Brown: out (knee), Immanuel Quickley: day to day (elbow), Ja'Kobe Walter: out (shoulder), Scottie Barnes: out (eye) for the Raptors.
Jaden Ivey: day to day (toe), Bobi Klintman: out (calf), Simone Fontecchio: day to day (toe), Tim Hardaway Jr.: day to day (head), Ausar Thompson: day to day (illness) for the Pistons.
